name: twice_as_much
description: First has twice as much as second, first is known - divide to find second, then sum
templates: {name} has two {container}s. The first {container} has twice as many {items} as the second {container}. If the first {container} has {first} {items}, how many {items} does {name} have in total?
There are two {container}s of {items}. The first has twice as many as the second. The first {container} contains {first} {items}. How many {items} are there altogether?
{name}'s first {container} has twice as many {items} as {subject} second {container}. The first has {first} {items}. What is the total number of {items}?
